definitions.definition: The figure who introduced Islam , and the man to whom the Qur'an was revealed ; considered a prophet by Muslims and Baháʼís .
examples: Shias believe that Ali succeeded the prophet Muhammad as leader of the Ummah.

definitions.definition: A male given name from Arabic very popular among Muslims .

main_definition: ( Islam , uncountable ) The figure who introduced Islam , and the man to whom the Qur'an was revealed ; considered a prophet by Muslims and Baháʼís .
secondary_definitions: ( Islam , uncountable ) The 47th sura (chapter) of the Qur'an .
( countable ) A male given name from Arabic very popular among Muslims .
